snippet.title: The First Mine - Gameplay Teaser (Preview)
snippet.description:
My name ist Stefan and I am a solo game developer from Berlin, Germany. The First Mine is my first developed game ever. It is a relaxed turn based building and puzzle game. I hope you will like it. But please don't compare the game with games from professional indie game studios. If you have any questions or feedback, join the Discord https://discord.gg/9WSwt8DZJp.

Please support me by adding my game to your Steam wishlist! Thanks!
► Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2328840/?utm_source=youtube

♦ The First Mine ♦

Play a calm and relaxed game alone in single player mode or play together with up to 4 friends in multi player mode. Each round you have to place, group and upgrade various tiles to mine gold and collect resources like wood, stone, wheat and fish.

To mine gold, you need people in your villages. To keep them, you must provide enough wheat and fish. More people and a higher level increases the amount of gold produced per round. You need wood and stone to upgrade the level.

In order to increase your yield per round, you can solve various tasks during the game and observe the requirements when placing tiles. In addition, there are different random game events that can influence the game in a positive or negative way.

♦ Links ♦
